channel.title: CEH on Note about technology
channel.description: Recent content in CEH on Note about technology

item.title: Rootkits: The Hidden Threat
item.description:
Rootkits: The Hidden Threat

Rootkits are a set of tools and software used to maintain hidden access to a computer system after it has been compromised. They are designed to be stealthy and difficult to detect, making them a significant security threat.

item.title: What is a Rubber Hose Attack?
item.description: A Rubber Hose Attack refers to a technique in cryptography and cybersecurity where physical or psychological coercion is used to extract information. This term is often used metaphorically to contrast with theoretical or technical methods of breaking encryption.

item.title: DoS/DDoS Attack
item.description:
Certainly! Below is the enhanced version of the article with additional details on each type of DDoS attack:

Understanding DDoS Attacks

A Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attack is a malicious attempt to disrupt the normal operation of a targeted server, service, or network by overwhelming it with a flood of internet traffic. These attacks are executed by leveraging a multitude of compromised computer systems, often referred to as “bots” or “zombies,” which are under the control of the attacker. DDoS attacks can cause significant downtime, financial loss, and reputational damage to the targeted entity.

item.title: Computer Virus/ウイルス 分類
item.description:
ウイルス種類

ポリモーフィック型ウイルス

いわゆる変異型。感染ごとに異なる鍵で暗号化し、パターンマッチによる検知を回避。

item.title: CHNTPW Windowsパスワード初期化・リセット
item.description: Kail LinuxをUSBブートしCHNTPWツールにてwindowsのパスワードをリセットできます。 administratorパスワードをロストした場合の復旧手段の１つとなります。

item.title: Cyber Kill Chain サイバーキルチェーン
item.description:
サイバーキルチェーンとは

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kill_chain#Cyber

ロッキードマーティン社のキルチェーンのプロセスをサイバー攻撃に適用したもの。

item.title: Pharming and Phising
item.description:
Pharming　ファーミング

https://csrc.nist.gov/glossary/term/pharming

DNS（Domain Name System）などのインフラサービスを攻撃者が改ざんし、契約者を偽造した検証機/RPに誤誘導し、契約者に機密情報の漏洩や有害ソフトウェアのダウンロード、詐欺行為に加担させる攻撃。

item.title: nmap cheat nmapチート
item.description:
nmapとは

ポートスキャンツールです。ペネトレーション作業の基本ツールです。
